data.title: Financial Inclusion in Afghanistan
data.meta_description: Latest research on financial inclusion and microfinance in Afghanistan including news and events on digital financial services, women's economic empowerment, consumer protection and more.
data.text:
Afghanistan is a country in South Asia. On this country page, you can find key financial inclusion knowledge resources and data available specifically for Afghanistan, including the latest publications, news and events.

FinDev Gateway provides knowledge resources related to financial inclusion in nearly all countries across the globe. Discover the world of financial inclusion with FinDev Gateway's regional and country knowledge hubs:

Explore financial inclusion by region: East Asia & Pacific | Europe & Central Asia | Latin America and the Caribbean | Middle East & North Africa | North America | South Asia | Sub-Saharan Africa

Also, take a look at FinDev Gateway's complete list of country knowledge hubs to discover relevant financial inclusion knowledge resources and data on any country of interest.

Do you have knowledge resources, data or other information on this country that you would like to share with the FinDev community? Submit content here.

And if you have any other ideas on what we could include on this country page, please contact us here.

Key Financial Inclusion Data

The charts below, based on the latest available Global Findex data, explore key financial inclusion trends in Afghanistan. Find out how the country compares to others in the region and across the globe on important aspects of financial inclusion such as account ownership and usage, the gender disparity in financial inclusion and financial resilience.
